General.Name: Airo Lam limited
General.Description: Airo Lam Limited engages in the production, manufacture, and marketing of laminate sheets and plywood boards for residential and commercial applications in India. The company offers decorative, door skin, chalk and maker board, liner and bakers, anti-finger print, synchronized, digital, fire retardant, anti-bacterial, unicore, high pressure, high gloss, and post forming laminates. It also provides compact sheets, interior wall claddings, unicore compacts, restroom compact and locker solutions, and sandwich compacts; general purpose plywood used in partition and paneling, ceilings in public rooms and corridors, office interiors, hotel interiors, residential interiors, and commercial establishments; blockboards used in furniture, paneling, interior decoration, partitions, etc.; and acrylic sheets in wall partitions to lighting fixtures and canopies, instrument panels, windows, windshields, and mirrors. The company sells its products through a network of distributors and dealers. It also exports its products to Singapore, Malaysia, the United States, the United Kingdom, Kuwait, Bangladesh, Saudi Arabia, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Qatar, the United Arab Emirates, Syria, Iran, Egypt, Nepal, and Vietnam. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Prantij, India.
